content:
1. Attention, shoppers! JDE Shopee SG's SSS Sale is coming on 25th February! Enjoy up to 50% off on a variety of products, vouchers worth up to $13 off, and a buy one get one free offer on L'OR Crema Absolu Profond Coffee Beans. And, with a minimum spend of $99, receive a FREE Happycall Titanium Frying Pan as a gift! Don't wait, head to JDE Shopee SG on 25th February and start shopping! These deals won't last long!
2. Get ready to save big with JDE Shopee SG's SSS Sale on 25th February! Enjoy up to 50% off on a wide range of products, vouchers worth up to $13 off, and a buy one get one free offer on L'OR Crema Absolu Profond Coffee Beans. And, with a minimum spend of $99, receive a FREE Happycall Titanium Frying Pan as a gift! Don't miss out on these amazing deals! Head to JDE Shopee SG on 25th February and start shopping!
